name: Chair Spinning Simulator
description:
Chair Spinning Simulator is an ultra-fast-paced 60-second game where you accumulate spin on your chair and blast off into space, destroying everything in your path towards your goal.

Gameplay

  • Spin Your Chair As Fast As Possible!
  • Fly your chair into space as high as possible!
  • Get money
  • Upgrade chair
  • Try again!

Features

  • Chair
  • Spinning
  • Destruction Of Rocks and Local Fauna
  • Space
  • Soundtrack by This is the Glasshouse
